channel.title: I Fight Cancer and Win on My Hugo

item.description: Date Event Description 06-23 stool test Dr. Tony Lee, walkin clinic, 粪检, 屁多恶臭 07-14 colonoscopy/biopsy Dr. Wong, Richmond Hospital, found rectum cancer 发现直肠癌，肠镜，活检 07-20 CT exam Richmond Hospital, follow-up exam 07-29 virtual visit BC Cancer Association involved 08-05 colonoscopy St Paul Hospital, first vist Dr. Karimuddin, UBC professior 08-15 MRI Richmond Hospital 08-23 Dr. Lefrefne
